trans-unit.source: Provides the options available for resolving types used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece as opções disponíveis para resolver os tipos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions" /> class.
Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions" /> class.
The default types in the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePrensenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O padrão de tipos no controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePrensenter" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions" /> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> control should show the type browser directly when a user tries to select a type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePresenter" /> deve mostrar o navegador de tipo diretamente quando um usuário tentar selecionar um tipo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePrensenter" /> control should show the type browser directly when a user tries to select a type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePrensenter" /> controle deve mostrar o navegador de tipo diretamente quando um usuário tentar selecionar um tipo; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a filter used to filter types in the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePrensenter" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um filtro usado para filtrar os tipos no controle <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypePrensenter" />.
